creator: eric_97@pobox.com
text:
If I try to use a UserParameterModifier in a client/server run, it can throw a
NullPointerException on the server when I start the test run, with the
additional effect that no URL fetches occur.  I'm not sure whether this always
happens, or only sometimes (e.g. depending on where the UserParameterModifier is
in the tree).

The problem is that allAvailableUsers is never initialized, because
testStarted() is never called.  testStarted(String) *is* called, but doesn't do
anything.

I more-or-less fixed it by just making testStarted(String) delegate to
testStarted().  But I'm not submitting that as a patch because there may well be
more to it than I know of.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
